snippet: Four people have died of hypothermia in the San Francisco Bay Area while the region is gripped by freezing temperatures.
abstract: Four people have died of hypothermia in the San Francisco Bay Area while the region is gripped by freezing temperatures.
lead_paragraph: Four people have died of hypothermia in the San Francisco Bay Area while the region is gripped by freezing temperatures.

headline.main: California: Cold Is Blamed in Four Deaths in Bay Area
headline.print_headline: California: Cold Is Blamed in Four Deaths in Bay Area
